div.p: Museum National d’Histoire Naturelle, Laboratoire de Phanerogamie, Paris.

MS is stamped: ' Faculte des sciences — Botanique — Caen '.
25/12/61

I have just time to inform you, that I have crudely dried for you a large case with many thousand Austr. Algae, which require to be resoaked & to be put on paper, for which purpose I had no time just now. I shall send them in the course of this week probably pr "Young Australian" to Mr Redhead of London. The freight to London will be paid here.
See M to R. Lenormand, 24 January 1862 (in this edition as 62-01-24a). If you have any dried plants to spare for us, pray let me know. Should any of your scientific societies wish me to send any thing I shall feel it a honor to procure for them what I can
